text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump There’s a simple solution @realDonaldTrump.

If you don’t want reporters/journalists to repeat to you the bullshit you say, DON’T TALK BULLSHIT.

It couldn’t be simpler or easier. 

https://t.co/917RzXfy40
